QuestData.Title: Wormtalon Wreckage
QuestData.Description: As if Shaladrassil's encroaching roots were not enough to deal with, now the Wormtalon harpies have come to take advantage of our plight. $b$bKill them, $r. They deserve nothing less for feeding on our misery.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you taken vengeance for us, yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Such violence should not be necessary. Thank you, regardless.
